Markup

Crossbow can create truly beautiful markup. Just view source on this page, you'll see exactly what we mean!

<main>
    <div class="container">
        {{inc src="someinclude.html"}}
    </div>
</main>

... turns into: 

<main>
    <div class="container">
        <p>Look, Indentation is preserved</p>
    </div>
</main>
